name: Opportunity Category Runner Up of Garuda Hacks 2.0
description: Created an Open Search collaboration platform. Garuda Hacks is an annual global 36-hour virtual hackathon where the world's greatest talents will compete to solve the world's most pressing challenges using technology.

name: Finalist of HackBiz 2021 Competition
description: A Hackathon x Business Case competition to challenge youth innovators to be able both excel at critically think the solution and implement the solution itself, provide opportunities for participants, especially students throughout Indonesia to innovate, create, and implement an edu-tech themed business idea to alleviate poverty in Indonesia through an integrated and inclusive education platform.

name: Honorable Mention of Mile Zero Project Competition
description: A case competition of 4 sub-topics, namely AI for Healthcare, Sustainability, AI for Small Medium Enterprises, and Campus Digitalization. Each case will represent one sub-topic and participants will try to solve problems related to the sub-topic through this case competition.
